#Text=Use a Big Check in Your Business for Marketing
#Text=Business companies donate big checks for many purposes .
#Text=These events are not given as much consideration as they deserve in marketing aspect .
#Text=This article points out why and how big checks can be used for marketing and publicity in 12 points .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Make sure you have good-quality , above-the-shoulders photos of all your experts who are likely to be interviewed by the media ... .
#Text=have these folks in the big check picture if possible
#Text=Consider asking your photographer to shoot " environmental portraits " of your experts .

column1: #Text=An architect , for example , might be shown holding several rolled up architect 's renderings under her arm .
#Text=A construction executive can be shown holding a hard hat or other tools of his trade .
#Text=Weekly newspapers that do n't have big photo staffs would probably welcome these photos .
#Text=Have these props available in the big check photo .
#Text=Have interior and exterior shots of your company available for the media .
#Text=The interior shots can show people at work .
#Text=Submit big check photos with news releases about the donation .
#Text=Pie charts , bar charts and other graphics can often help readers understand complicated issues such as budgets .
#Text=Offer to supply information to media outlets so they can create their own graphics to accompany the article they 're writing about .
#Text=If you 're sponsoring an event that does n't necessarily warrant a story , call the photo desk at your local newspaper and let photographers know what 's happening .
#Text=Let them know that a big check will be involved ... . .
#Text=they are still unusual and help get your photo published .

#Text=If a photographer from a newspaper or magazine takes photos at your company , never demand to see the negatives , or dictate what photo they should use with the article , or ask for free copies of prints .
#Text=The negatives are the property of the media outlet , and the media maintains full control over their use .
#Text=If you want prints , expect to pay for them .
#Text=Try to ensure that the photographer gets a photo of the big check exchange .
#Text=When sending prints to the media , be sure correct identification is on a sticker on the back of each photo .
#Text=When sending several photos , slip a piece of paper between each one so the ink from the back of one photo does n't bleed onto the front of the photo behind it .
#Text=Avoid using big clunky photos at your website because they slow down the time it takes a page to load ... .
#Text=big check
#Text=photos on your website show that you care and are active in the community .
#Text=In addition to the check passing photo , take a photo that illustrates what the money will be used for .
#Text=Make sure you offer all your images as digital photos that the media can access at your website , perhaps in a password protected area that the public ca n't access .
#Text=If you 're sponsoring an annual event , take lots of photos yourself and offer them to the media the following year to be used for pre-event publicity .
#Text=The big check photo can be used for many years .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do not discard big checks as just another event .
#Text=It can help a lot in strengthening your brand name .
